description: Location of 0's when natural numbers are listed in binary.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (elemIndices)a003607 n = a003607_list !! na003607_list = elemIndices 0 a030190_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 11 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
